query:
SELECT t.id as tripId, t.name as tripName, COUNT(h.id) as hotelCount
FROM trips t
LEFT JOIN hotels h ON t.id = h.tripId
WHERE t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%'
GROUP BY t.id, t.name;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2cdS9hyY6XNQUTe.root --database 2rtwtAqF2DqhH9oEcii9XY --execute SELECT t.id as tripId, t.name as tripName, COUNT(h.id) as hotelCount
FROM trips t
LEFT JOIN hotels h ON t.id = h.tripId
WHERE t.name LIKE '%Slovakia%'
GROUP BY t.id, t.name;
